tests.prompt: Create a Fighter with Defense style wearing armor. Verify AC calculation includes +1 bonus from Defense.
Create a Fighter with Defense style NOT wearing armor. Verify no AC bonus is applied.
Create a Fighter with Two-Weapon Fighting style. Make an off-hand attack. Verify ability modifier is added to damage.
Verify system can detect when an attack is an off-hand attack vs main-hand attack.
Activate Second Wind on a Fighter. Verify healing event is published with 1d10 + fighter level.
Use Second Wind. Verify resource is consumed. Try to use again. Verify it fails with resource exhausted.
Use Second Wind, then take a short rest. Verify Second Wind use is restored.
Activate Action Surge. Verify ActionEconomy.ActionsRemaining is incremented.
Use Action Surge. Verify resource is consumed. Try to use again. Verify it fails.
Use Action Surge, then take a short rest. Verify Action Surge use is restored.
Champion Fighter (level 3) rolls a 19 on attack. Verify it's treated as a critical hit.
Non-Champion Fighter rolls a 19. Verify it's NOT treated as critical (only 20 is critical).
Save and load a Fighter with Defense fighting style. Verify style persists correctly.
Use Action Surge, save character, reload. Verify Action Surge resource state persists.
